description:
Ever have to do something again and again? Ever forget one of the times you needed to get it done? Need to take medicine or vitamins throughout the day? Making dinner and you don't want to forget to check the oven again and again? Need a simple reminder to keep you from forgetting some task that you have to repeat over and again? Do It Again Will remind you again and again!

***Release Notes:***
v1.0.6
** Added the much requested feature to allow user to set start date & time.
v1.0.7
** Changed Alarm Detail to Alarm Preferences.
** Changed interface for setting Date and Time.
** Changed interface for starting and stopping an alarm from Alarm Preferences
v1.0.8
** Updated List and Alarm Preferences UI.
** Fixed Issue w/ Continuous alarms not always repeating.
v1.2.0 Works with SimpleTime Lite to speak the time
